record.id: field.name="cpyopn" and file.name="kmprofile" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: cpyopn
record.file.name: kmprofile

brief.brief: If selected (set to true), enables members of this profile to copy information in the current kmdocument record and open a new record containing the same information.

detail.detail: If the record has associated attachments, Service Manager prompts you to copy the attachments with the kmdocument record.
If you choose to copy the attachments, Service Manager creates a new attachment for each original attachment. The new kmdocument record can then be modified and added.
